mapper.select: SELECT FREENO, TITLE, WRITER, HIT, IP FROM FREE ORDER BY FREENO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE (FREENO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (STUDENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT F.RANK, F.FREENO, F.WRITER, F.TITLE, F.IP, F.HIT, F.CONTENT FROM (SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY HIT DESC) AS RANK, FREENO, WRITER, TITLE, IP, HIT, CONTENT FROM FREE) F WHERE F.RANK <= 3
